name: The Means
description:
Sometimes, your only choice is to suffer or walk away. The Means was the result of 2 weeks of work by a team of students trying to explore what defines a game, and represents an effort to push back against that definition. In The Means, the player only has one point in the story at which they can influence the outcome, and there are only two options: allow it to happen, or walk away from the game. The Means explores the idea of consequences, and asks the question: "if you could see all the consequences of a choice you made, would you still make that choice again?"

Jamie Laks - Writing, Storyboarding, Narrative Design

Jordan Peloquin - Writing, Storyboarding, Music,  Sound Design

Noah Akinloba - Art, Pencilling, Coloring

Alex Weisenbach - UI Design, Programming

Bryce Kerr Abraham - Art, Inking, Coloring
